website_summaries.verdict: A hearty crunchy bite made from first-rate ingredients and nothing else. A great snack for cleaning tartar from teeth, too!
pros: Grain-free crunchy treat uses quality ingredients, such as cranberries, salmon oil, and peas
cons: All flavors include a poultry ingredient that won't work for cats with allergies

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzball approves
customer_reviews.text: My cat is addicted. Doesn't hurt that wellness is such a trusted brand and the treats are grain free. We put these into a puzzle ball and the furball sprints across the house at sound of the treat bag. I feel good about giving him these.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: I shouldve included graphic photos......
customer_reviews.text: I finally opened this packet for my cat, he had one treat yesterday morning before I left for work. 9 hours later.....it was diarrhea city when I got home! All over the front doorway, hardwood floors, walls, and sadly all over my cat's bottom and tail! What do I do with the rest of the bag??
customer_reviews.author: kiwiwong

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these and they arent 'junk food'!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved these. I have never seen treats in this shape and that are crunchy that were not made out of by-products (like Temptations). I stopped feeding my girl those by-product treats because my vet explained how so very unhealthy they were. When I found these at a local pet store, I bought them but didnt think she would like them because they are not junk food. My cat LOVES them. I then looked to amazon for a supply at a less costly price.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Contains Chicken Meal Now!
customer_reviews.text: I used to always buy these because they didn't have chicken meal or chicken of any sort. My cat has an intolerance to.chicken and they are using chicken meal now! Why?? Not buying them anymore until they fix this.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Both of my picky older cats ADORE these!
customer_reviews.text: Recently the treats I have been buying were no longer available through Amazon but were available from other shippers for three times the price. As much as we love our cats, that was just too pricey. Searching through "cat treats" I found these. Initially I ordered just one 6oz. bag. My cats went ballistic for that flavor. Next I ordered the six bag assortment and they love them all! The only problem that I have now is that they both come running from wherever they are in the house if I open the drawer they are kept in. Definitely will be ordering them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kat's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting great things with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting great things with this product. Our furry felines really seem to like Wellness Core cat food and gobble it down. I know there are good ingredients in the Kittles but my little darlings just don't care for them like they do some other brands (the ones not so good for them). We ran out of cat food last night and it was too late to go to the store. I got the idea of spreading out several of the Kittles all around the cats' feeding area and they were all gone by this morning.It's just like trying to feed finicky little children
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lewis

customer_reviews.title: my two kittens like it
customer_reviews.text: My new kittens have very different tastes. One likes wet food, the other likes dry food. And even their choice of treats differs - one loves Temptations and the other doesn't (I never met a cat who didn't like Temptations, so go figure). So I ordered a couple of different kinds of treats, and both kittens like this one. The treats are smaller and flatter than Temptations treats, which makes it easier to chew for kittens, and they both like the flavor. These treats cost more than the ones I can get at the grocery store, but if the cats are happy......
customer_reviews.author: ccsteveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE EXPIRATION DATE
customer_reviews.text: Well my kitty got a pkg of the turkey and cranberry kittles in the Christmas Kitnip box and LOVED them, no small miracle since she's diabetic and these are all-natural and grain-free. Ignored the $8.99 price tag for 2/2oz pkgs and ordered them on December 29th, 2017. Received delivery as expected on January 9, 2017. She wouldn't touch them. After a bit I noticed the expiration date: December 16, 2017. Almost 2 weeks before I ORDERED them. Seriously?! Way to clear your warehouse on the consumer's dime
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Graham crackers of cat treats
customer_reviews.text: I think these are like the graham cracker of treats. Meh. Dry. Not very special. My cat doesn’t go gaga for these like she does for other brands. And she’s not a very picky eater. I feel that treats should be a little rich and indulgent, since I only use them as rewards for training purposes. So these are a little too- dare I say- healthy. Like getting an apple on Halloween. They’re very healthy though. So if you have an obese cat and still want to treat them, these are probably really good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend's Cat Approves
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend's cat, Mowgli, loves these! I bought Mowgli some of these treats for Christmas (along with a few kitty toys) because my boyfriend didn't have any treats to give his cat for good behavior. I bought three flavors (chicken, tuna, and salmon) to try but decided to open one early (the tuna) to start training Mowgli not to bite, show aggressive behavior, or scratch the furniture. Mowgli went absolutely crazy! The second I opened the bag, he couldn't stop meowing. Even after a few of these, he still looks for more! Plus, I love how healthy these treats are. I'm hoping we can finally curb some of Mowgli's bad habits and slowly replace them with good ones.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: These were a HIT!
customer_reviews.text: My cats (I have 2) just have gone CRAZY for this product! They follow me around everywhere I go, hoping I am going after their favorite snack. I have to HIDE the packs or the will sniff it out and try to get the package open! Thank you for this product! I originally bought it because of the cranberries....I was told that cranberries are good for urinary health. Every other product I tried was not a hit. My cats are very finicky, but they love, love, love Kittles!
customer_reviews.author: Katrell47

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and according to my cat, terrific flavor
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves treats, all treats. I buy Wellness for the quality. Check the ingredients and compare to cheap treats. My cat loves these treats so much that I practically have to keep them locked down. Before I kept them under tight security I had them on a high shelf in the walk-in pantry. My cat climbed to the top shelf, got the treats down, carried them to the living room, and proceeded to shred the bag and eat most of them. Not happening again.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci SquierTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these treats. I give them 3 at a time and they always look up at me for more! I actually also just recently got another cat from the shelter and at first he didn't know what to do with them since he was used to lower quality treats, now he gobbles them up just like the other 2.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Insane! This stuff is veritable kitty crack! My ...
customer_reviews.text: Insane! This stuff is veritable kitty crack! My cat goes nuts over these treats. All she has to do is hear me opening the cabinet (she can tell the difference between the sound of the treat cabinet and all the other cabinets- don't know how, but she does.) and she comes FLYING to the kitchen. Mewing, under foot, wrapping around my ankles, etc, etc. I got this treat dispenser--  to slow her down a bit. I have never seen a cat go so nuts for a particular treat. No other brands cause her to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Connor

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended for Cats Prone to UTI
customer_reviews.text: My cat, who has had numerous UTI in the past, after switching her diet to wet food, we supplement with these treats. They are perfect for maintaining her Urinary tract balance due to the cranberry. Also they are grain free and healthy, which we like. Highly recommend for all cats, but especially those who are prone to UTI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Treat For  Their Value
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. They are a perfect size. I like that it is made with cranberries which helps keep the UTI'S away, and less trips to the vet. Also keeps the tartar off their teeth. I am very picky in what I give them. When your cat really loves the treats your giving them, you know it taste good. Has no chemicals in it, so there's no nasty smell or gives them bad breath. The price is awesome. I do recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: peppercorn

customer_reviews.title: Cat doesn't care about them
customer_reviews.text: Tried getting these for my kitten and he did not seem to care about them. He ate them, but did not go crazy for them. i tried to give him more than one and he just walked away. I tried giving him this treat multiple times and he just was not interested in these treats. I like the ingredients, and nutrition, but my cat simply does not care about them so I just throw them in with his food so I can get rid of them.
customer_reviews.author: WarrDawg

customer_reviews.title: Kittles Treats | Grain free/natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than Temptations. My girl is getting up there in years & developing digestive problems. When I realized how bad the other treats were & that I was contributing to the problem, I did some research & switched all of her food to grain free/natural ingredients. She's still having some problems, but there is a quite noticeable improvement... A work in progress. So glad I found them!
customer_reviews.author: MsKashmereKatt

customer_reviews.title: Healthy but not yummy to my cats
customer_reviews.text: I believe that this treat is very healthy for my cats, but they must know that too, because this is their least favorite treat. It even ranked below my one cat's prescription calming aid treat which she will at least lick at. All 5 of mine say no thanks and leave it on the floor. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Treats Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My cat, while never a picky eater, absolutely loves Wellness treats. And I, as the human giving them to him, love the clean list of ingredients. True to its claim, there are no by-products, wheat, soy, gluten, etc. This is as clean a product as you can get! The price is awesome on Amazon, though I do an autoship order with Chewy.com now and buy through them. These are amazing treats and my little guy is happy with every flavor. He does have a history of UTIs and bladder stones, so I feel like anything with cranberry can only be beneficial for him, even if a tiny bit. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A Thurn

customer_reviews.title: Crumbs anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I love getting Wellness treats for my boyfriend's cat but was a little upset when the bag came (duck). I shook it prior to opening and thought it sounded completely different & odd compared to the other bag of Wellness treats I got (chicken). It was practically ground up sand with a few whole pieces. :/ His cat loved it anyway (I guess it was like cat cereal) but considering Wellness is a well-established brand, I kind of expected better. Other than that, it was okay. Not sure if anyone else had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: vincent toczylowski

customer_reviews.title: My Kittens love them and so does their older brother!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for training incentives for my 2 new 10 week old kittens. i didn't expect it to be so difficult to find treats made specifically for kitten growth and development. The product information included that these would be suitable for kittens so i took a chance and purchased the Chicken and Cranberry flavor. They LOVE them!!!!!! They are small and thin enough for the kittens to eat and they go crazy for the flavor. When they hear the package being opened; they come running. My adult cat is equally thrilled with them. They came on time as promised by the seller and in perfect condition. i will be reordering these!
customer_reviews.author: Luchia Buca

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves Them; Good Ingredient Reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my picky cat who won't eat my regular cat treats, and she loves them. I refuse to buy low quality ingredient treats, but these had several reputable reviews online regarding ingredient quality and recall history. While I'm a tad bit weary of treats that are cut into cute shapes, I've had no problems so far. 8/10 have been buying again and again
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Can't argue with a Cat!
customer_reviews.text: Cat won't eat this "Healthy" alternative...she's stuck on "Temptations", likely from prior humans blessed with her angelic affection, intelligence, beauty and cleanliness. Her elder human died, and we were Blessed to adopt her. After several years as a rightful member of our family, she deserves to have what she prefers
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Evans

customer_reviews.title: I don't love giving my cats treats
customer_reviews.text: I don't love giving my cats treats, but they sure love receiving them. These don't have any of the ingredients several hours of researching down a rabbit hole taught me to avoid. My cats are also fairly picky (absolutely no fish or duck, and no to other treats I've tried) but both eat these.
customer_reviews.author: Cait K

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered two varieties of this product and my cat hated it. Would sniff it and walk away
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two varieties of this product and my cat hated it. Would sniff it and walk away. I think it's the rosemary in it which I don't think cats like. Update: I gave them to my daughter's cat and he loved them. He's not a picky eater like mine is.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much only use Wellness brand for my cat because she loves the flavor, and I love how healthy it is for her. She has about ten treats twice a week. It hasn’t effected her weight in any way, and she does tricks for them. She is really happy and so are we. The chicken and cranberry is our favorite because chicken is very easy for cats to digest.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat :)
customer_reviews.text: So as far as cat or dog treats go, I look for a few things. Those things being, my animal's enjoyment of the product, ingredients, and price. Price isn't bad for these due to the fact that subscribe and save and random coupons normally make these very reasonable. Also, Wellness Core always provides a great, healthy, and tasty product for my animals. I love looking at the ingredients list and knowing what I give them is great for their health and they apparently like the taste because they always perk up and get excited about treat time lol. In conclusion, I'm very happy with my purchase of these and feel good giving them to my animals :)
customer_reviews.author: Kenyon Shiflett

customer_reviews.title: Receipe - or something -  changed. Cats won't eat them anymore.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 11/6/16 - My cats will no longer come near these - have tried the last two batches from Wellness, same thing. Wellness says they didn't change the recipe, but I don't believe them. My cats went from loving them, for years, to sniffing them and looking at me like I'm trying to poison them. Underwhelmed with Wellness' response to my two phone calls. What can I say - the very very picky cat loves these, and they're much healthier than standard treats. A big win in my book! :)
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Maven

customer_reviews.title: Food has never tasted so good. Considering the way they tore into the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: These treats are what my cats have been dreaming of their whole lives. Food has never tasted so good. Considering the way they tore into the bag when offered a sniff, I'm shocked they didn't chew through the box before Christmas. All four of my finicky felines love these treats and the all-natural, high-protein ingredients are a huge bonus. Would recommend for all cats, especially those fat cats in need of a low-carb treat.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Brewer

customer_reviews.title: My cats won't eat it. :(
customer_reviews.text: It seems like this would be a great product, but neither one of my girls will touch it. One if my cats is pretty picky, so I wasn't surprised, but my 2nd cat will eat practically anything and she won't touch this either. I'd like to think this is a good product, but since my cats won't eat it, I really can't give a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Cita

customer_reviews.title: My rescue cats love these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My rescue cats love these. One of the cats, a senior rescue has an allergy to grains. Have to be careful what to give to her. They do get tiered of them from time to time and I have to switch to another one. Hence, the four stars. Contrary to what amazon thinks for another flavor of this, I AM NOT in any way connected to this item. I don't make it or own it. Where on earth does amazon get their information? My cats love these, that's all.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: My  cat likes them now - they are a good value
customer_reviews.text: It took a few tries, but now my cat really likes these (and all the other flavors as well). It took about three attempts for him to eat them, now it's not an issue. I got these to ensure he does not get another UT blockage. A bonus is that they are only 2 calories per treat- way less than the regular main stream treats I used to give him on a regular basis. The price is just a bit more, but not much.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 my cats
customer_reviews.text: I prefer not to write a review on this Product, because my 🐈 didn't like it, so I gv it 2 my neighbor since thr 🐈 seem 2 eat anything. Mine are very particular abt thr treats. I really wanted 2 try it tho. Even tho I rated a 1 star another 🐈 might like them. Every animal is different, so plz don't be be discouraged w/my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Selina Bronstein

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves these treats. He managed to get himself into the underside of a couch (not safe) and I was able to get him to come out by shaking the treat bag!
customer_reviews.author: SparkleChick

customer_reviews.title: I have a particular Siamese.
customer_reviews.text: He is wonderful and he is picky. These are the ONLY... and I mean.. ONLY... treats he will eat. So thankful I found a bigger bag than what the local store carried. They are smaller than the ones in the store here, but they are perfect and the price was great. He's in little kitty heaven.
customer_reviews.author: courtney love

customer_reviews.title: they go nuts for Temptations which I refuse to give them My cats are fed canned 90% meat grain free and raw food So I search for
customer_reviews.text: Cats are turning cartwheels But then, they go nuts for Temptations which I refuse to give them My cats are fed canned 90% meat grain free and raw food So I search for a treat which meets my exacting standard At least these are grain free with no by products As TREATS go (I use them sparingly) I am quite pleased. HOWEVER the price has gone up over double what I initially paid I do not like Amazon's price fluctuations especially when enrolled in subscribe and save. Unless you keep an eye on that there can be some nasty shocks
customer_reviews.author: kimono

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky kitties
customer_reviews.text: I recommend the duck and cranberry for picky eaters. My female has uti sensitivity and I am always looking for specific food items that will compliment her diet needs (good chaser w her medicine too), not all cranberry treats are tasty apparently. This high quality item is a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect treats that kitties will love, and that you'll feel good about giving them.
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak of flavor, or scent. It all smells like cat food to me ;) But the kitties seem to enjoy it. Especially my little fudge ripple ice cream cat (She looks like fudge ripple ice cream to me) her favorite, in particular, are the salmon flavored treats. As a cat mom, I love that these treats have quality ingredients, and that there are no by-products or grains, and that they're made right here in America.
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: My kitten didn't like the taste
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this item a 3-star rating was simply because my kitten didn't like it -- as in she would eat one and then prefer to go back to her cat food. Overall nice packaging, and based on the ratings, I'm sure most kitties would enjoy it...however mine did not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive tummy’s
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a sensitivity tummy and hasn’t been able to keep treats down. I’m glad I took a chance on these! She is so crazy for them that I bought the bigger bag! No tummy issues even if she has 5 at a time. & I like the option of the smaller bags to try out the flavor choices!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Strong start, weak finish
customer_reviews.text: The ninja princess likes these new treats, so it makes for a nice healthy change from the Temptations Chicken flavor ones she usually gets. Can't give it 5 stars til we see if does or doesn't tire of them before the bag is finished. :) 1 month update: After about a week, she really doesn't like them anymore, but will eat them if mixed in with her other dry food. Will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gran-Free (But Not Starch-Free) Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats really like these treats, including the picky one. The treats are quite small (about the diameter of a pencil eraser and only a fraction of an inch thick), so they would be appropriate for kittens. Note that although these are grain free, there are plenty of starchy ingredients (such as potatoes, peas, and chickpeas), so these should really only be given occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrisama

customer_reviews.title: Staple Treats
customer_reviews.text: Cat is little picky, turned his nose up at Temptations brand treats. However, he loves these in all flavors available! I always have this brand and Blue Wilderness on hand. I rotate through flavors of both brands when it’s time to reorder using Amazon subscribe & save.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: They don't think they're treats.  Dont' know why.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what it is about these snacks but both of my cats had the same reaction. They smelled them, looked at me and walked away. I can only guess that they don't attract them as treats should. I've left a couple out and they walk right by without trying to eat them. I get the message. They don't want them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelin Y.

customer_reviews.title: No luck.
customer_reviews.text: I had such hope for this product that I bought a "bunch" of them. However, unfortunately, not one of my 4 cats will even touch them! I've tried everything I can think of to entice them to just try at least one, but no luck. They just look at them and sniff and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: My kittens love these
customer_reviews.text: I started giving these to my 2 month old kittens to encourage them to come to me anytime I called them. It worked very well because they love these treats. I also had another brand of treats that were soft, but they definitely preferred these.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Out Cats, Who Usually DON'T Like Healthy Snacks, Enjoy These! ^_^
customer_reviews.text: Our cats, Shadow and Leo, usually DON'T like healthy snacks; they will sniff them, and then walk away. However COMMA they enjoy these. This is a BIG plus since we've bought so many different kinds of snacks over the years. Thank you! ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Finicky cat likes it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My very finicky cat likes this flavor. I'm going to try the others too. She gets 2 a day after giving her medicine. She has IBD, so her treats need to be beneficial. It has cranberry in it which is a good ingredient for IBD. Her vet is anti-treats, but she said this one is better than the crap in the grocery store or even PetSmart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: not this flavor for my kitties
customer_reviews.text: I received a small bag of the turkey flavored treats in my monthly kitnipbox. My cats went nuts for them. I ordered the salmon flavor this time, but sadly they won't touch them. 3 cats and the treats have been sitting on the floor untouched for 2 days. I need to find the turkey flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: andygrl

customer_reviews.title: Sam Sez:  Paws Up On These!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 flavors: salmon, turkey and whitefish (all with cranberries). I gave Sam a couple of each to see which he might prefer (no he's not spoiled 😺...much). He went nuts ove the whitefish-a 6 on a 5 scale..the other 2 were both 5's. Definitely found a new bribe..err treat 😉
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Rankin

customer_reviews.title: My cat avoids these treats!
customer_reviews.text: I have a treat jar with a variety of lil treats I give my cat. She is not a picky eater, but she literally picks through the few pieces of treats that I give her and will not eat these treats. I finally decided to throw them out!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Not even fat cats will eat them
customer_reviews.text: Our cats hated these and they are fatties that eat almost everything even our food so that should tell you something.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Scooby is addicted, loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat will do anything for these treats. Used these to teach him to sit and lift his paw for treats.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my kitty's favorite treats and I love that I can get them on Amazon. I used to purchase them directly from the local pet food store but they are a much better price online through Amazon and same great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Becka

customer_reviews.title: great for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is a picky eater only when it comes to treats. She likes Temptations brand treats, however I wanted a healthier substitute and decided to give yet another treat a try. To my pleasant surprise, she loves this brand, too! It's been a lot of trial and error so I'm happy to have found a healthy snack she actually enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Sara T.

customer_reviews.title: Kitten wont Eat
customer_reviews.text: My new kitten eats everything. Wood, plastic, popcorn, chicken, sausage, apples, anything you are eating - steals food from my toddler... she would not even touch this.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna White

customer_reviews.title: Best Ingredients for Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: I have fed my cat MANY brands and flavors of cat treats during the past eleven years and this brand and flavor seems to be his favorite. The ingredients are better than what is found in most cat treats, and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya McLouth

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat she loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Kitten is very happy she loved the taste and when she hears the bag she comes running ready to have a special treat! Flavor must be good because she likes them although I can't say for sure because I'm not the one eating them but by the reaction must be good. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: branden boling

customer_reviews.title: My cat and I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I use these treats to teach my cat tricks and he loves them. Horus Annubis is a Bengal mix rescue that sits,kisses, speaks and gives me his paw or shake hands. Yes, he is an exceptionable smart cat, but because the treats have less then 2 calories I've had great success without worrying about his heath.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My cat only like the temptations treats and those have such crappy ingredients I wanted to see if I could get him to eat another type of treat mainly because he has to take 2 pills every day and I give him a couple treats after. I was pleasantly surprised to see he likes these! I've bought a lot of healthier treats and he DOES NOT like them at all! But these, a great hit for him! Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Leah H.

customer_reviews.title: Our cats hate these
customer_reviews.text: Our cats are not fussy eaters--and they hate these treats. They spit them out at first and now won't touch them. I think maybe it's the cranberries--they only eat grain free/all meat food regularly. Waste of money and we got 3 bags!
customer_reviews.author: Altered Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Kitten broke her tooth with these.
customer_reviews.text: Although my kitten enjoys these treats, I can no longer give it to her. The treats are too hard and she broke her tooth because of them. I would not buy again, now I have to figure out what to do with the rest of the bag. If you have a kitten, these are not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chari

customer_reviews.title: Cat & owner approved
customer_reviews.text: I like that the quality is there and my cats love it as a treat. All the flavors they offer chicken and salmon too. It is worth every penny! I rather give them higher quality treats than the cheaper stuff out there.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE these treats and they are actually kind of healthy. They should make something for humans - imagine healthy chocolate or ice cream or....you get the point. The only downside is that they are addictive. One cat cries for them multiple times a day. Very annoying. But I feel good knowing that they are healthier than the other brands out there. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a little treat ball. Fit perfectly and my cat loves them.
customer_reviews.author: StaceBomb

customer_reviews.title: Cats loved these
customer_reviews.text: I have two of the laziest, freeloading cats in the world who wouldn't twitch if a mouse ran across their noses. Yet, when the kids gave the cats these they perked right up. Ears at full attention, followed us around the house and practically begged for more. Big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Billy P

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack
customer_reviews.text: Our cat goes nuts for these. When we adopted him from the shelter, this was the brand they treated him with. If he hears the bag, he always comes running... makes it easy to find him when he's hiding outside!
customer_reviews.author: Elim Horton

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes...
customer_reviews.text: Not one of my four cats will eat them. I won't throw the bag away but I keep trying. I guess I have super finicky cats. I was hoping they would love this since it's far healthier than the typical cat treat out there.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: If only my cat liked them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these excited to give my kitty but she will not eat them. I have to hide them in her food for her to eat them. I am just trying to get her to finish them to try something else. But I did like what Ingredients it had, with the size of the bag along with the price.
customer_reviews.author: KellyM

customer_reviews.title: Kitty approved !
customer_reviews.text: My 3 cats all love crunchies and they went crazy for this stuff. When they got them there was nothing left in the bowl. I can't say much more than that. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: george senda

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: We have two older (11, 13) cats, each with varying degrees of kidney disease who have dietary restrictions. I purchased these treats because they are grain free. The cats enjoy them (especially the salmon), they each get 1-2 treats each evening and I have not observed a negative reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Cymerick

customer_reviews.title: Kitty's Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: We used to feed our cats Greenie's, but they were never crazy about them. I've tried the pill pockets, and those gave them diarrhea. These treats though, they go bananas for!! Very crunchy and small.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Our Dusty "Comes a running" when we shake the little ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Dusty "Comes a running" when we shake the little glass jar we keep his Crunchy Kittles in. We found several little glass jars with metal screw-on tops so we would be able to shake one while Dusty is sound asleep and rooms away... he comes running just as soon as he hears it!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: cat does not like these
customer_reviews.text: loki's on a grain-free diet so I thought I'd try these. he hates them and they smell like fish food. reviews were solid so I was surprised that whenever I put one in front of him and he just smells it and walks away. he doesn't have that discerning of taste but that's my/his experience with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bantam

customer_reviews.title: My 6 Months Old Kitten Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It is little small in size but my kitten likes this. It even cleans his teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kitten loves it. I'll give her two once in a while as a treat for well behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Better than others!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has a sensitive stomach and a super annoying picky palate :D These are the only treats I've given her so far that she comes RUNNING for. I like that they are grain free and easier on her stomach than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Note: grain free is not healthy for cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat has allergies towards seafood, so the vet recommended switching her to duck. She loved these the second I gave them to her (she's very picky). My biggest problem with these is that they are grain free. It was my fault for not noticing. Do not give your cats grain free anything. It increases the chance of your cats developing heart problems, especially if they are still young. I wish they made these treats that weren't grain free.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: My cat needs kitty drug rehab after discovering these.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure exactly what it is about these particular treats, but my 14 year old (usually picky) cat screams at me incessantly until I give him his daily allowance of whatever feline crack these are. If I were to let him write a review, he would write a novel on his love for these. Needless to say, I will be ordering these in bulk from now on. They also arrived super quick, which is good, because I was being held hostage in my own home until I made with the cat treats. Now peace has been restored. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My cat is not much for treats and I did not expect much of these but when she ate one she went crazy for them. She kept asking for more. I will definitely buy her more.
customer_reviews.author: Bavila

customer_reviews.title: Buy according to your cat’s preferences
customer_reviews.text: Most of my cat’s treats are seafood flavored, so I decided to buy her the Duck and Cranberry treats to switch it up a bit. She likes it, but she doesn’t love it like I’m sure she would if it was salmon or tuna. Now I know!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Approved
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat with IBD loves these treats so much that she’ll do tricks for them :-) They’re also pretty much the only small crunchy cat treat I can find with duck as the first/main ingredient for her prescribed “novel protein diet”.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes his crunchies
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes these treats, in different flavors. He knows that "want a treat" tone of voice, and doesn't hesitate to join me next to the cupboard where they are kept.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality treats
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves these, the ingredient quality is top notch, and at 1 calorie a treat easy to make sure you're not overfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and yummy  treats
customer_reviews.text: I only buy holistic food for my cats and they don't always like it as much as the regular. I'm happy that they both love these treats and I feel good about giving them something good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Caracal

customer_reviews.title: These are supposedly clean but will tax cat's urinary system
customer_reviews.text: My cats like these but they suffer from too-frequent urination on them. Stopped the treats and the problem went away. Cranberry not a great idea for cats!
customer_reviews.author: albion

customer_reviews.title: Wellness Duck Flavor a Fave for my Cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats like Wellness Duck Cat Treats because of the taste; I like these treats because they are healthier than many other brands and the price is competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Katsnjabber

customer_reviews.title: Cats don’t like them
customer_reviews.text: one of my cats wouldn’t eat it , the other one ate them but I think it affected her appetite . They look and smell like wet plywood . So I wasted my money 😡
customer_reviews.author: Shane Fradella

customer_reviews.title: One paw up one paw down
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this. He knows the sound of the bag and comes running. My lady however does not. She likes the crappy treats better. Can’t win them all I guess.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Tasty (according to my three cats), Healthy, and Tooth Enhancing
customer_reviews.text: All three of my cats are crazy about this treat. The crunchiness is great for helping with tartar control on their teeth. This treat appears to be healthy, and it's a great price.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Kitty approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have two very spoiled cats. They're extremely picky about treats. I was having trouble finding some they liked at the grocery store and was going to try a pet store when I thought to check here. These were the first I purchased online so I only bought one package. After we got them and my fur babies tried them I had to order more. It's been almost a year, and they still love them...most of the other flavors, too.
customer_reviews.author: NavyWife99

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treats are a must!
customer_reviews.text: Healthy treats are a must! There are so many treats and foods out there for our pets that aren't healthy. Quite honestly, I wouldn't feed my cat anything I wouldn't eat. I try my hardest to stay away from lots of grains and Wellness has helped me by being able to provide a quality treat for my cat. She instantly loved them. Although, I'm beginning to think that she'd happily eat anything that I feed her haha. I didn't try these myself but they didn't smell terrible like a lot of food/treats do. GO WELLNESS!
customer_reviews.author: Janell Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my cats favorite treat. He loves the Wellness food as well. My vet was the one that suggested the Wellness brand. Have been using it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: RG29

customer_reviews.title: SCRUMMY
customer_reviews.text: I crushed this into crumbles and sprinkled it onto the tuna casserole a made for work for the last 10 minutes. EVERYONE LOVED IT! SMASHING
customer_reviews.author: Liza R. Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Our Cats Now Won't Eat Any Other Treats
customer_reviews.text: These have spoiled our cats, who now will not eat any of the other healthy, grain-free treats we have around. We've bought all the flavors of Kittles and will be sticking with 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these were a hit with my very picky cat before they were even opened! I took the bag out of the shipping box and my cat appeared out of nowhere, and was extremely "helpful" when I was trying to open the bag. She inhaled the ones I gave her and immediately asked for more. She rarely loves treats I buy, it is often a waste of money. I personally like these treats because they are safe for me to feed and don't have my allergens in them.
customer_reviews.author: Hillaryti Heals

customer_reviews.title: They are a big hit with our picky little furbaby!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A cat treat that my little sweet cat will eat. We had to switch her to soft food a few months ago. We tried giving her some dental cats treats, but she refused to eat those. We went through several kinds of treats before finding these. She absolutely loves these. We can even sprinkle these treats on top of those other treats and she'll eat those too. I get these Kittles out, and she comes running. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It is good to find something that my cat will like
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat that is hard to please, she loves these treats. It is good to find something that my cat will like.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Wellness food and treats since 2003 for both my cats until they both required prescription diets. Good news is that I was able to continue the Kittles treats in both cases as they are a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

product_meta.title: Wellness Kittles Crunchy Natural Grain Free Cat Treats
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Turkey And Cranberries| Size:2-Ounce BagWellness Kittles Grain Free Natural Cat Treats, Turkey & Cranberries Recipe are irresistibly tasty, 100% all-natural wheat free, grain free crunchy treats made in USA only. These natural crunchy dental cat treats not only are as tasty as they are healthy, but have a crunchy texture that helps to clean your cat's teeth. Each all-natural treat bite is packed with big taste from whole-food ingredients like Turkey, cranberries and blueberries. With nothing artificial and under 2 calories each, you can show your cat extra love with Wellness Kittles natural cat treats.
feature_bullets: CRUNCHY CAT TREATS: Indulge your cat with these natural, grain free crunchy cat treats; at only 2 calories per treat, Kittles are the purrfect way to show your kitty love; they're not only delicious, but help clean teeth too
ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS: These treats contain only premium, high quality, all natural ingredients including fruits and veggies; real meat is the number one ingredient
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: We craft delicious treats with simple, natural, high quality ingredients chosen for their nutritional benefits; no meat byproducts, artificial colors, flavors or preservatives
FIND THE RIGHT TREATS: Wellness offers a full range of treats to support your cat's specific needs, including kitten and indoor cat treats, grained and grain free, and crunchy and chewy varieties

WELLNESS NUTRITION: Created by nutritionists, veterinarians and animal lovers, our recipes provide an ideal balance of nature's finest ingredients, carefully selected to nourish and sustain your pet's wellbeing
